thread.title: US stocks fall sharply on China growth worries
thread.title_full: US stocks fall sharply on China growth worries - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Steve Rothwell, Ap Markets Writer
title: US stocks fall sharply on China growth worries
text: Photo: Seth Wenig, AP FILE - In this Monday, Aug. 24, 2015, file photo, the New York Stock Exchange is seen. Global stocks were mostly lower Monday, Sept. 28, 2015, following Wall Street's loss last week as investors looked ahead to Chinese and U.S. economic data. FILE - In this Monday, Aug. 24, 2015, file photo, the New York... NEW YORK (AP) — The stock market had its worst drop in nearly a month as investors worried about more signs of weakness in China's economy. FILE - In this Monday, Aug. 24, 2015, file photo, the New York Stock Exchange is seen. Global stocks were mostly lower Monday, Sept. 28, 2015, following Wall Street's loss last week as investors looked ahead to Chinese and U.S. economic data. FILE - In this Monday, Aug. 24, 2015, file photo, the New York... NEW YORK (AP) — The stock market had its worst drop in nearly a month as investors worried about more signs of weakness in China's economy.
